GSD.product_version: versions from v5.18 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
powerpc/32s: Fix boot failure with KASAN + SMP + JUMP_LABEL_FEATURE_CHECK_DEBUG

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit fbe72bebba775244f5f54e0df1f278a42819bf0e, it was introduced in version v5.18 by commit 4291d085b0b07a78403e845c187428b038c901cd. For more details please see the references link.
